import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Registration = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ childName: '', childAge: '', childSchool: '', childGrade: 'Kindergarten', parentName: '', parentContact: '', parentEmail: '', additionalInfo: '' }); const [formSubmitted, setFormSubmitted] = useState(false); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setFormSubmitted(true); // Show the success message }; const closePopup = () => { setFormSubmitted(false); }; return (
